sentences.sContent: This monolithic environment for an application eliminated any concern about which clock to use -- because there was only one clock.
sentences.sContent_eng: This monolithic environment for an application eliminated any concern about which clock to use -- because there was only one clock.
sentences.sCn: 对于一个应用程序的这个单块集成电路环境消除了使用哪个时钟的问题 —— 因为只有一个时钟。

sentences.sContent: The solutions that were developed for that were usually large monolithic programs containing the business-level logic hardcoded in the modules.
sentences.sContent_eng: The solutions that were developed for that were usually large monolithic programs containing the business-level logic hardcoded in the modules.
sentences.sCn: 为此开发的解决方案通常是大型单片电路程序，在一些模块中包含硬编码的业务层面逻辑。

synos.tran: [建]整体的；巨石的，庞大的；完全统一的

phrases.pCn: n. 整体结构；单片结构；独石结构

remMethod.val: mono(单个的) + lith(石头) + ic → 单块大石头的 → 巨大的

trans.tranCn: 单片电路, 单块集成电路
